sentences: Shaw taught herself how to DJ and make beats as a hobby, ended up moving to New York City to pursue her dream of acting.

She gained recognition from her follow up songs "Get Down" that reached No. 39 on the Billboard Hot Dance/Electronic Songs chart, "Space Jungle" which received over 40 million views, "Moxie" which was released on Afrojack's label in 2015, and "N2U" with singer Martha Wash.
She had DJ residencies at Las Vegas nightclubs including Hakkasan in MGM Grand.
